      • NetworkPlayer

        public NetworkPlayer(java.net.Socket sock,
             java.io.ObjectInputStream ios,
             java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos,
             Figure.Color c)
        Creates network player. Socket is included for proper closure.
        Parameters:
        sock - Socket with connection to remote host.
        ios - InputObjectStream on this socket.
        oos - InputObject stream on this socket.
        c - Color of this player.

        public void end()
